unnormalised: Arre yaar, last week only I was telling my friend Rakesh about how his design for that new mobile cover is totally unique. He spent months perfecting the chai-stained aesthetic! Now, he's saying some big company from Bangalore is selling something almost identical. He didn't get it patented or anything, thought it was too much hassle, just shared it on Insta. Adv. Sharma told him he *might* have a case for copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, 1957, but it's gonna be a long fight and might cost him Rs. 50,000 just for the initial consultation. He’s so frustrated, says he should’ve listened and got that IP sorted out when I told him to on 12/07/2023! Moral of the story: Don't be lazy, get your stuff protected!
normalised: Arre yaar, last week only I was telling my friend Rakesh about how his design for that new mobile cover is totally unique. He spent months perfecting the chai-stained aesthetic! Now, he is saying some big company from Bangalore is selling something almost identical. He did not get it patented or anything, thought it was too much hassle, just shared it on Insta. Advocate Sharma told him he might have a case for copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, one thousand nine hundred and fifty seven, but it is going to be a long fight and might cost him rupee fifty thousand just for the initial consultation. He is so frustrated, says he should have listened and got that I-P sorted out when I told him to on twelfth July two thousand and twenty three! Moral of the story: Do not be lazy, get your stuff protected!
